(row = 6, col = 5)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 5)

In the current state, the avatar (positioned at (row=6, col=5)) has not moved since the last action. Therefore, I will proceed to analyze the state:

- The avatar is surrounded by various sprites, including ammo symbols ('@') and other entities.
- Importantly, there is an available portalAmmo ('#') located at (row=7, col=30) toward the right of the avatar.

To progress strategically, my goal includes resource management, specifically focusing on obtaining ammo to support attacks.

Since the avatar did not move last turn, I will first attempt to rotate and then move to the right where more resources may be accessible.

I will take the action to move right. 

``` Action:3 ```
This action is expected to help the avatar get closer to the right side of the map, potentially obtaining more resources while keeping on the lookout for enemies.
